PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02042011-02-10HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Adverse Drug Reaction Reporting)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (Adverse Drug Reaction Reporting), in order to strengthen the current adverse drug reaction reporting section of the Regulations in a way that benefits Canadians while also aligning with other regulatory jurisdictions. Manufacturers will be required to notify the Minister when there has been a significant change in a drug's risk-benefit profile, which will permit the Minister to obtain manufacturers' analyses that led to these conclusions and to better monitor the safety of drug products in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0031 Publication Date: 2011-03-02
